document_data.name: Launcel
document_data.mainbody: '''Launcel''' was a soldier in the [[Purple Dragons]] based in [[Castle Obarskyr]] in [[Suzail]], [[Cormyr]], during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Launcel was called upon by King [[Foril Obarskyr I]] in the wake of the massacre during the [[Council of the Dragon]] of the {{yearlinkName|1479}}. When the former [[Royal Magician]], [[Vangerdahast]], revealed the place where [[Vainrence]] and current Royal Magician [[Ganrahast]] were imprisoned, Foril ordered [[Glathra Barcantle]], a high-ranked [[War Wizard]], to take all of his Purple Dragons to save the trapped wizards, leaving him guarded by Launcel and [[Tarimmon]] alone.
